Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: We are given a DECLARE model as a Python dictionary. We need to add constraints to mitigate bias. The model currently has constraints: existence, absence, exactly_one, init, responded_existence, coexistence, response, precedence, succession, altresponse, altprecedence, altsuccession, chainresponse, chainprecedence, chainsuccession, noncoexistence, nonsuccession, nonchainsuccession.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Thus, we should add constraints such as: 1. Non-succession: CheckApplicantRace should not be directly followed by Reject. 2. Coexistence constraint: ManualReview must coexist with Approve_Minority and Reject_Minority. 3. Response constraint: CheckApplicantRace -> BiasMitigationCheck.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to recall DECLARE definitions: response(A,B): whenever A occurs, B must occur after it. precedence(A,B): whenever B occurs, A must have occurred before it. succession(A,B): response(A,B) and precedence(A,B).

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: To target only sensitive applicants, we need to condition on the attribute. In DECLARE, constraints are purely based on activity names, not data values. So we cannot directly constrain based on data attributes like ApplicantRace: Minority. Unless we encode the attribute as part of the activity name, e.g., Approve_Minority, Reject_Minority.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: One approach: use a precedence constraint: FinalDecision -> ManualReview? That would force manual review before decision for all, but that might be too strong. Alternatively, we can use a response constraint: MinorityDetected -> ManualReview. Given the complexity, perhaps the intended solution is simpler.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Thus, the updated model will include: In coexistence, add two entries. In response, add one entry. In nonsuccession, add one entry. These are straightforward and follow the format.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Given the instruction is just to add constraints as examples, we dont need to prove they are logically perfect. So Ill add the following: coexistence, response, nonsuccession.
